title: Research-Based Scientific Inquiry Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental scientific theories and experimental methods
context.additional_context: Learners identify real scientific problems as research topics based on work experience, in an environment enabling data collection/analysis using digital tools.

learning_goals: Learners can reformulate given scientific problems into research questions and develop a research design.
Learners can improve research methodologies by incorporating peer feedback and present interim results.
Learners can present conclusions based on scientific evidence and evaluate practical applicability in a final report.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
